channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US teacher jailed in Russia is formally designated as wrongfully detained
item.description: The State Department says an American schoolteacher arrested in Russia on drug charges more than four years ago has been designated by the U.S. government as wrongfully detained.
